April 23, 1949 D North Eastern Area (Championship Section)
Yorkshire Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Area yorkshire-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Yorkshire
Championship
Morning Rhapsody
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prize Money: 1st £60, 2nd £40, 3rd £20.
Eric Ball was barred from conducting B&R since he was the composer of the set piece.
May 12, 2011, 10:07 a.m. March 20, 2016, 10:01 a.m.
